A second part of Observations, censures, and confutations of divers errours in Mr. Hobbs his Leviathan beginning at the seventeenth chapter of that book. / By William Lucy, Bishop of S. David's. Observations, censures, and confutations of notorious errours in Mr. Hobbes his Leviathan. Part 2 Lucy, William, 1594-1677.
[8], 236, 32, [17] p.
Printed by S.G. and B.G. for Edward Man at the White Swan in S. Pauls Church-yard, London : 1673.
Includes index. With final errata leaf. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
